data.text: Wonnue, wɔn a wɔhyɛ mmara a ɛmfa ne kwan mu,
de siw ahiafo ahofadi ho kwan,
Dɛn na mobɛyɛ wɔ akontaabu da no,
Ɛrenka mo hwee sɛ mobɛfra nneduafo mu
“Nnome nka Asiriani no, mʼabufuw abaa,
Mesoma no akɔ ɔman a wonnim Onyankopɔn so
Nanso ɛnyɛ eyi ne nea ɔpɛ sɛ ɔyɛ
Na obisa se, ‘Ahemfo nyinaa nyɛ mʼasahene ana?
Kalno nyɛɛ sɛ Karkemis ana?
Sɛnea migyee ahoni ahenni ahorow abran so,
Merentumi ne Yerusalem ne ne nsɛsode nni,
Sɛ Awurade wie nʼadwuma a etia Bepɔw Sion ne Yerusalem nyinaa a, ɔbɛka se, “Mɛtwe Asiriahene aso wɔ ne komapirim ne nʼani a ɛnsɔ ade no ho.
Efisɛ ɔka se,
Sɛnea obi teɛ ne nsa hyɛ berebuw mu no,
Abonnua ma ne ho so tra nea ɔtow,
Afei Awurade, Asafo Awurade,
Israel Hann no bɛdan ogya.
Ne kwae ne nʼasasebere anuonyam no,
Nnua a ɛbɛka wɔ ne kwae mu bɛyɛ kakraa bi
Da no, Israel nkae,
Nkae bi bɛsan aba, Yakob nkae bi
Israel, ɛwɔ mu sɛ wo nkurɔfo dɔɔso sɛ mpoano nwea de,
Awurade, Asafo Awurade de ɔsɛe
Enti sɛɛ na Awurade, Asafo Awurade se,
Ɛrenkyɛ koraa mʼabufuw a etia mo no ano bedwo
Asafo Awurade de mpire bɛhwe wɔn,
Da no wobeyi wɔn adesoa no afi wɔn mmati so
Wɔhyɛn Ayat;
Wɔfaa ɔtempɔn no so, na wɔka se,
Teɛ mu, Galim Babea!
Madmena reguan;
Nnɛ ara wobegyina wɔ Nob;
Hwɛ, Awurade, Asafo Awurade no,
Ɔde abonnua betwitwa kwaedɔtɔ agu fam
